events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for days.
System categorized the issue based on keywords indicating a delivery delay from the customer's initial report.
The customer's delivery delay case has been assigned to agent Sarah for further assistance.
Hello! I’m Sarah and I’ll be helping you with your order. Sorry to hear about the delay you're facing.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can check the status for you?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and the latest tracking status shows 'In transit' but no updates for 5 days.
Thank you for the details. I’ve contacted the shipping carrier to expedite your delivery and will update you as soon as possible.
Thanks for the quick response and for reaching out to the carrier. I appreciate your help.
Your order has now been delivered successfully. Please confirm if you have received it and that everything is okay.
Just checking in to ensure your order arrived and you are satisfied with the resolution to the delivery delay.
Since the delivery issue is resolved and confirmed by you, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
